Legal_Issue: Credibility assessment and availability of internal flight alternative
Evidence_Type: Medical certificate, PIF omissions, testimonial evidence
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistent testimonies, lack of key evidence, failure to prove inability to relocate
Application_Error: Failure to provide required documentation and omissions in application
Legal_Standard: Reasonableness standard for credibility and state protection
Application_Factor: Omissions in PIF, lack of medical certificate
Decision_Review_Issue: Whether panel erred in credibility and internal flight alternative findings
Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credible evidence and failure to prove inability to relocate within Mexico
Evidentiary_Issues: Missing medical certificate, inconsistent testimony, PIF omissions
Credibility_Issues: Inconsistent testimonies, lack of supporting documentation
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of panel's decision
Procedural_Issue: Failure to meet evidentiary burden in refugee claim
Omission_Type: PIF omissions, failure to submit medical certificate
